attributes.action: call a General Election immediately, in the light of the wrongful use of expenses by all parties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am proposing a petition of no confidence in all the parties, in terms of their misuse of claims for expenses. Given this, its time we had upstanding members of the community again, rather than those interested in power and greed running our country

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
